Header: Mock Operation Apprehends T 56, Hand Grenades & Satellite Phones at Sea
Content: A well-coordinated seaborne mock operation to seize warlike equipment, being smuggled or kept in hiding along the Nilaweli beach hide-outs got underway Thursday morning (12) in Trincomalee as one more phase of the ongoing Ex-'Cormorant Strike-2019'. After intelligence confirmed that those explosives and warlike items are smuggled using fishermen's boats at sea, the naval, ground and air force troops in the Exercise without disturbing normalcy apprehended 5 suspects aboard two fishing boats with T-56 weapons, hand grenades and several satellite phones while they were sailing between Nilaweli and Kuchchaweli.
